Congressman John Duncan of Tennessee was at one of those hearings.
He joins us from his office.
Thanks so much for being with us.
Well, Scott, thank you for having me.
Do we still need air marshals?
No.
I think it's the most needless, useless, wasteful program almost probably in the federal government, and that's - that's saying quite a bit.
